titleStmt.title: The new covenant, or, A treatise unfolding the order and manner of the giving and receiving of the covenant of grace to the elect as also, shewing the difference between the legallist and the true Christian : being the substance of sundry sermons / preached by Mr. Cotton ...
titleStmt.author: Cotton, John, 1584-1652.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by M.S. for Francis Eglesfield & John Allen ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
